page.title: 04View from Twyn Garwa Rise.
page.content: From the top of Twyn Garwa rise a splendid view of the Caerphilly area can be observed. The built up and agricultural areas stretch out unobstructed for miles. The farms which can be viewed are modern in both structure and design which is interesting to note. One of the farms, Cwm, was once a school but when the school closed the building was renovated and turned into a farm which is still worked today. There are also mines in the area. These are not shaft mines but drift mines, and one of the old disused drifts goes under the main road. The stone which covers the entrance is visible in drought conditions.
